response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds immense value for you. Given your keen interest and the significant importance this item has to you, I am extending an exclusive offer.

I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This figure represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic worth to you and my valuation, aiming to ensure both parties' satisfaction and fairness in the transaction.

Please consider this proposal carefully. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to provide all necessary details to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
